about_the_game:
Fancy some heavy stuff? This is GROOD - Original Soundtrack, composed by Andrew Wildman, 11 tracks of pure rock-metal stuff.
All the tracks are 320kbps MP3 files.

The Soundtrack will be placed here: …Steam\steamapps\common\GROOD\Soundtrack

Grab your headphones and enjoy the music!

Tracklist

  • 00 - Last Stand
  • 01 - This Is My Payback
  • 02 - A Neverending Night
  • 03 - From Beneath The Sea
  • 04 - Flying Faster Than a Bullet
  • 05 - Long Way From Home
  • 06 - The Brain
  • 07 - Ascension
  • 08 - Mechanical Party
  • 09 - Hail To The New Lord
  • 10 - Grooette
